actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Commodity Credit Corporation to extend intermediate term agricultural credits in support of the export of agricultural commodities and the development of long-term agricultural export markets abroad.

summary.text: Agricultural Export Credit Act - Amends the Food for Peace Act of 1966 to permit the Commodity Credit Corporation to finance export sales of agricultural commodities on credit terms in excess of three years, but not more than ten years.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Commodity Credit Corporation to extend intermediate term agricultural credits in support of the export of agricultural commodities and the development of long-term agricultural export markets abroad.
